entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Blowing snow at times. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:56 AM CDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow at times early this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:56 AM CDT Friday 31 March 2023
